Package farm

Class Store

java.lang.Object
farm.Store
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
Class to represent the store. has methods to buy crops and animals

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Store()
    Populate the store's stock to contain one of each game item
